website_summaries.verdict: A high-quality chandelier that offers an elegant look and easy installation.
pros: Choice of oil-rubbed bronze or brushed steel finish
Offers quality construction combined with an elegant look
cons: At 22-inch in diameter, this chandelier is a bit large, which may not work for smaller rooms
Getting the diffuser to hang level can be a bit of a chore

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful!
customer_reviews.text: I read numerous reviews and took my time researching and I agree with everyone. It looks way nicer in person and I disagree with all the bad reviews. I got it professionally installed and it's even and looks much more expensive than I paid for it. I also swagged it off center and the chain was long enough for the project. I cut maybe 12 inches off the chain since it was very long. You're going to love it! Go for it. It's a nice dark grey color shines brownish because of the light color and the hardware is a brown color that reminds me of espresso wood which goes well with my decor. Very contemporary.
customer_reviews.author: A. SmilingTop Contributor: Baby

customer_reviews.title: updated dining room lighting
customer_reviews.text: We replaced our 25 year old original builders light fixture over our formal oval wood dining room table with the beautiful light. It is bright, modern, and looks fantastic. We used 3 -100watt bulbs. the bottom "difuser" makes it a very pretty soft light. The shade is as dark as the picture. It has kind of a greenish/tan linen look when the lights are off with black trim. When lights are on it looks more beige. There is a seam but isn't that noticeable. The chain was plenty long, at 6 ft. Our ceilings are over 12 ft and it hangs perfectly right above the table.
customer_reviews.author: Kjc66

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: Love it! It was the perfect addition over the table in our eat in kitchen area. The diffuser doesn't fit perfectly but it isn't noticeable so, it's not enough to deduct a star. Aldo, the seem is a little wide on the shade but also not enough to deduct a star. I would totally buy it again.
customer_reviews.author: Roxanne

customer_reviews.title: and this fit in nicely without smelling like moth balls
customer_reviews.text: This has a contemporary look with a retro 50's/60's vibe, which is why I was drawn to it. Having a swag lamp really adds to the midcentury look of a room, and this fit in nicely without smelling like moth balls. It's classic, modern, and functional. Perfect light for over the dining table! I ended up also purchasing a swag kit and wired it in to plug in and hang. There is already overhead lighting in the room, but needed more direct lighting over the table. This is a large lamp, Worth the $
customer_reviews.author: =GOB=

customer_reviews.title: BEAUTIFUL!!
customer_reviews.text: BEAUTIFUL !!!!!!!!!! Hangs over my kitchen table. very stunning. it glows a rich brown when you dim the lights down. I didn't use the shield at the bottom. didn't like the thick white acrylic. looks perfect without it. you can get chrome top lights so the lights don't glare in your face. it is absolutely perfect. I also the got the mini light to go into my entryway. wow! if I sell my home.......I want to take them with me!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Lovely fixture
customer_reviews.text: I wanted a new kitchen fixture to update my house. Was a little skeptical, I like to see and touch, but I took a chance and WOW, everything was true that was said. 'beautiful !!
customer_reviews.author: Carol Kimball

customer_reviews.title: Nice looking provides good filtered light
customer_reviews.text: Purchased to use in walk in closet to replace ceiling fluorescent. The fixture provides good filtered lighting for this purpose and is attractive.
customer_reviews.author: M. Hoffman

customer_reviews.title: Looks great and easy to install.
customer_reviews.text: Great looking light with easy install. I wish the white part on the bottom was matte and not shiny but we get complements on this fixture all the time. Can’t beat the price.
customer_reviews.author: TiredMommy

customer_reviews.title: Looks fantastic
customer_reviews.text: Just like the images. Updated and modernized the room, and looks fantastic. The hanging chain is unusually strong and it's tricky opening them to shorten the chain without damaging the finish on them, even using cloth with the pliers.
customer_reviews.author: Susan R.

customer_reviews.title: Looks great
customer_reviews.text: A lot of mixed reviews for this light, but it looks like I lucked out and got a good one. No issues with hanging or assembling and the shade and diffuser look great. It fits great over my 4x8 dining table and ads a nice modern look. The one thing I will say is that I need to get brighter bulbs than I thought. With the dark shade it needs to be brighter than a standard chandelier.
customer_reviews.author: Yarrow10

customer_reviews.title: This is a very attractive fixture -and perfect for over our dining room table
customer_reviews.text: This is a very attractive fixture -and perfect for over our dining room table. Lots of "down" light - and quite a bit of "ambient" light off the ceiling. Not much light from the sides, due to dark fabric - which is just as we wanted it. Solid/simple look... well constructed... and a very "quality" addition to our home.
customer_reviews.author: JRS

customer_reviews.title: The negative, is the metal is BLACK not BRONZE
customer_reviews.text: We really like the light. The light shade was correct as stated in the description. But the metal is BLACK NOT BRONZE as stated. I wanted bronze as it would have looked better in my room but we liked the rest of it enough we kept it.
customer_reviews.author: Laurie K. Glancy

customer_reviews.title: Pleasntly Surprised
customer_reviews.text: great light for price! My only concern is the plastic diffuser on bottom seems sorta warped or the light itself is, doesn't line up flush. Other than that It is exactly the dining room light I was looking for! We returned like 4 lights before this one, most were poor quality.
customer_reviews.author: ScriffyNerfHerder

customer_reviews.title: LOVE!
customer_reviews.text: Had this placed in my Breakfast Room over a round table. Does my room EVER look up to date! It puts out the light very well but it looks elegant at the same time. It has lots of class and you can hang it at a variety of heights which is nice. Hardware is very nice!
customer_reviews.author: Nancy A. Brunnemer

customer_reviews.title: Awesome Drum Light
customer_reviews.text: Bought this light for my kitchen. The typical builder chosen light was no where near where anyone would put their table. So instead of having an electrician add another box and then patching the ceiling, I bought this chandelier and swagged the chain over my table. Looks great! Shade is really pretty. Has a warm glow within when the light is on. The plexi glass diffuser does hang a little lop sided but I haven't really played with it yet to balance it. I'm in love with drum shades,...hung 3 last week.
customer_reviews.author: Catnip

customer_reviews.title: Excellent purchase
customer_reviews.text: Have had this hanging for 5 years. Lots of compliments. Great buy. May consider using brighter bulbs if this is in a darker room
customer_reviews.author: Dana Cannon

customer_reviews.title: It looks great and updated the whole room
customer_reviews.text: Put this in a house we are renting out. Every time I pull up to the house I'm jealous of this fixture. It looks great and updated the whole room. We hung it in the dining room of a 1930's house. We love it, the tenants love it.
customer_reviews.author: Momoftons

customer_reviews.title: Great Chandelier
customer_reviews.text: Love this chandelier. It looks great in the dining room - sleek and elegant, not too modern but not traditional either. You need to fuss with the diffuser to get it straight / flush. But you need to do that with pretty much any fixture that has a diffuser.
customer_reviews.author: JF

customer_reviews.title: I will have to be very pleased with it once hung in order to keep it
customer_reviews.text: Just received and haven't hung yet. Trying to decide whether to keep. The description of this lamp was so far off. It is not oil rubbed bronze, no part of it; metal is all black. I was wanting the oil rubbed bronze to match rest of decor. Even thou it is black it could still work - it will depend on how the light shines thru the shade and the color it sends off. If it produces a gray cast then it will have to go back. Also, this appeared to be an open-box item; plastic bags were tied not sealed. I will have to be very pleased with it once hung in order to keep it.
customer_reviews.author: diana

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful, even nicer than pictured.
customer_reviews.text: This fixture is just beautiful. I love the shade, and I love how you get the light but don't really see the lightbulbs. I am very pleased! A great value.
customer_reviews.author: Marathon Mom

customer_reviews.title: Well made - great value!
customer_reviews.text: The quality of this pendant is outstanding for the price. Installation was a breeze. The pictures accurately show the colors of the pendant. Hope this helps. The only thing that could be a little better is that it is hard to get the white diffuser level in relation to the drum. The diffuser is a thick plastic (high quality). Hope this review helps. I think you will be happy with your purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Bill Sickles

customer_reviews.title: Very disappointed. I purchased it for a new house that ...
customer_reviews.text: Very disappointed. I purchased it for a new house that we were building. When they went to install it, the cord had been cut so short, that it hangs three inches from the ceiling. The black cording that goes around the shade was completely off, needing to be reattached.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: As Expected
customer_reviews.text: Excellent conditional for a used product. Beautiful fixture, works great.
customer_reviews.author: Jen

customer_reviews.title: Had to send it  back
customer_reviews.text: In loved the look and the price of this drum light, however we had to send it back. Ours came with pieces missing, and after several trips to the hardware store we decided to let it go. We were able to hang the light makeshift parts, but the drum itself and the trim were crooked. The dark line around the drum did not even meet up level at the seam. however I could not praise amazon more for the easy return. Ups picked it up from our house, we didn't have to pay return shipping. Kudos to amazon, but thumbs down to kenroy.
customer_reviews.author: Mandycan

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Light was fine, but we returned because decided it was too large for where we wanted to hang it.
customer_reviews.author: A Harris

customer_reviews.title: it was a nice linen shade
customer_reviews.text: The chandelier was made incorrectly. The parts would not fit together as designed. I returned it the same day it arrived. As for how it looks, it was a nice linen shade, but the plastic diffuser felt cheap.
customer_reviews.author: Steven

customer_reviews.title: I really like it. At first
customer_reviews.text: I would have given this five stars. I really like it. At first, I thought it was too large, but once it was hung it is just the right size. The reason I did not give it a 5 is that the black velvet piping has gaps in it. I am going to fix it, but for the price, there should be better workmanship.
customer_reviews.author: Joyce

customer_reviews.title: Returning
customer_reviews.text: Returning. I received a one light pendant rather than the 3 as pictured. Very disappointed as I had the install scheduled.
customer_reviews.author: Julie Cotone

customer_reviews.title: Good quality
customer_reviews.text: I love this light. It's well made and a good size.
customer_reviews.author: Jon Q

customer_reviews.title: Boo to the amazon warehouse
customer_reviews.text: 2 Stars to amazon warehouse. It said no damage to item. My shade is damaged in 3 spots. Otherwise a nice looking light.
customer_reviews.author: AmyKen

customer_reviews.title: Pretty fixture - shady shipping
customer_reviews.text: Very good looking fixture that appears to be easy to install. Received a lamp that had obviously been returned at least once before - parts were loose in the box - metal parts were scratched and chipped. Returned same day it arrived
customer_reviews.author: Tim Nelsen

customer_reviews.title: Check the product for damage
customer_reviews.text: We ordered this light before for a family member and it was beautiful so I ordered it for our home and but parts of the shade looks like it’s missing material. I didn’t notice until we installed everything else.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah

customer_reviews.title: It was huge and I didn't think it looked as nice as I thought it would
customer_reviews.text: Eh. I returned .. It was huge and I didn't think it looked as nice as I thought it would
customer_reviews.author: Cattttttt

customer_reviews.title: Very happy
customer_reviews.text: Bought “used” (repackaged) and it was in perfect condition. Looks great above my dining room table. Very pleased with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: NC Girl

customer_reviews.title: This light is beautiful! It was a bit of a challenge to ...
customer_reviews.text: This light is beautiful! It was a bit of a challenge to install (took two of us). Exactly as described. Love it.
customer_reviews.author: oldestgal

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: It's a little to big for my dining room but will have to live with it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Just beautiful!
customer_reviews.text: This is the most beautiful chandelier to hang over a dining table! If I ever move from this house, I'm taking this chandelier with me. That's how much I love it!
customer_reviews.author: Sonya B.

customer_reviews.title: pretty, but no instructions
customer_reviews.text: This is a beautiful light, especially for the price. However, we didn't receive any instructions in the box and it is not clear how the (the round black cap) piece that covers the electrical box mounts to the ceiling. There is no hardware or holes to allow it to be drilled into the ceiling. We ended up wrapping the cord in black electrical tape to keep the from falling down onto the drum.
customer_reviews.author: AmazonShopper 2020

customer_reviews.title: Love the Light
customer_reviews.text: Even better than I expected. We bought this fixture since we needed to swag it over the table. Since the picture is so small it was hard to know the color but it's perfect. mix of brown and black with the oil rubbed bronze look for the pendant. The diffuser is plastic but no one knows unless they touch it,
customer_reviews.author: David Kiser

customer_reviews.title: Great Value
customer_reviews.text: Very nice drum light at half the price you see in stores. Bigger than I thought it would be but still works with my table. Makes nice modern statement. Lots of light with the 3 hundred watt bulbs but not glaring with the diffuser. Would be even better with a dimmer switch.
customer_reviews.author: maggie

customer_reviews.title: nice fixture
customer_reviews.text: great looking fixture BUT !! the plastic light lens does not lay flat with the shade until you heat it up then the heat from the bulbs lay it down & it looks perfect... When the light cools the lens sits in the shade tipped ! But i am very detailed person. over all nice lookin light fixture ..
customer_reviews.author: James Rizzo

customer_reviews.title: EXACTLY AS PICTURED AND DESCRIBED
customer_reviews.text: This is beautiful! I love it so much more in person. It is worth every penny! Those who wrote negative reviews concerning the size are idiots and clearly cannot work a tape measure. It is EXACTLY as described. I will definitely purchase from the Kenroy line again!
customer_reviews.author: Kristina

customer_reviews.title: A few cons away from 5 stars
customer_reviews.text: Great for my island. Love the look. 3 - 75 watt bulbs are perfect. Do not like the visible seam but have it turned where it is not visible from the other rooms. Also the white plastic on the bottom does not sit quite flat. I have to keep messing with it. Reason for only four stars.
customer_reviews.author: JDM

customer_reviews.title: it looks really nice in my dining room
customer_reviews.text: have had so many people complement on this lamp. it looks really nice in my dining room.
customer_reviews.author: christine lichtenthal

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: I bought this light to hang over the table in our eat-in kitchen. I was originally pleased with the look of it. Unfortunately the light filter on the bottom of the drum is made of plastic. After using the light for a bit, I noticed that the plastic light filter was beginning to warp and melt/ dimple in the center where the hardware gets hot from continued use. Now the filter droops down and hangs all lopsided under the drum shade. It is a source of constant irritation!
customer_reviews.author: T4T

customer_reviews.title: too modern for our decor but very nice light
customer_reviews.text: Very modern.. too modern for our decor but very nice light
customer_reviews.author: Cry33

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful Chandelier
customer_reviews.text: These are gorgeous and well worth the money. They look very high end.
customer_reviews.author: mystery

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful light!
customer_reviews.text: I love this light! It looks beautiful in my informal dining area. Arrived in perfect condition and was easy to install. Instructions were easy to follow and it hangs perfectly level. Looks great both lighted and with the lights off.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very nice!
customer_reviews.text: Perfect size and great style! No issues with parts or install...would have given 5 stars, but true that the hardware is black and not oil rubbed bronze.
customer_reviews.author: HWerb

customer_reviews.title: The light is diffused beautifully and the fabric has a sheen to it
customer_reviews.text: This is simply spectacular. The light is diffused beautifully and the fabric has a sheen to it.
customer_reviews.author: Clas

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful
customer_reviews.text: beautiful! I get lots of compliments on this pendant. It's the centeriece of my dining room and it ties everything together.
customer_reviews.author: Melanie A Vieux

customer_reviews.title: Da bomb, IMHO.
customer_reviews.text: We have a home built in 1960, with just a few echoes of Mid-Century Modern here and there; this dining room fixture is our favorite investment in helping us define a style for our house. It hits both home runs: it's very beautiful as an element in the room, and it is especially good at delivering gorgeous light when you're eating. Everyone at the table looks like they're in a well-lit movie.
customer_reviews.author: Mr. Hawlywood

customer_reviews.title: Great Light/Easy Install
customer_reviews.text: Very Stylish lamp. Holds 3 bulbs and costs a very pleasant light. Easy to install and good instructions.
customer_reviews.author: Mr. L

customer_reviews.title: Stylish, Great looking
customer_reviews.text: Nothing bad about this product. Very nicely made, not cheap. Looks great over table. Easy to put together. Used the 100w bulbs. The diffuser helped to tone down the light which makes it perfect for dinning. Love the color of the shade. Would recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Jeanne B.

customer_reviews.title: How to construct?
customer_reviews.text: Not perfectly constructed, but I have another problems, as shown in the attached photo. I cannot figure out how to construct it and neither could my electrician. The result is that half the light is unilluminated.
customer_reviews.author: samdoberman

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: I love this light above my kitchen table. I would not hesitate to recommend to anyone!
customer_reviews.author: T

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: bottom plastic circle is very bright white - almost blueish, looks a little cheap
customer_reviews.author: yelena

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great light fixture for the price. Awesome upgrade to my dining room!
customer_reviews.author: Christina

customer_reviews.text: Everything looks good but there were a couple of flaws in the shade that are noticeable to me. Thank you.
customer_reviews.author: Ellen M. Simon

product_meta.title: Kenroy Home 91640ORB Margot, 3 Light Pendant, Blackened Oil Rubbed Bronze Finish
product_meta.description:
One of Kenroy Home largest and most sought-after families, the Margot collection features clean and crisp designs that add a modern and engaging look to living rooms, dining areas, foyers and more. Designed with a consistent look across the collection, Margot's flagship design feature is an over-scaled and modernly inspired drum shade. With a modern design and sphere-shaped accents, each expertly crafted frame is finished with a modern and glistening brushed steel, bringing a modern twist to a French cottage dining room or a contemporary living room. No matter the style or the space, bring a touch of sophistication and illumination with the Margot 3 light pendant.

AMAZON.COM




Elegant lighting for almost any room of the home (view larger). A stylish spin on the traditional drum-style lampshade, Kenroy Home's Margot three-light pendant with its oil-rubbed bronze finish merges all things classic and contemporary for an ultra-modern look that works just about anywhere. The unit's 22-inch-diameter bronze gold metallic fabric shade evokes the distinguished textiles found in the world's finest hotels, restaurants, and penthouses, with elegant trimming completing the mid-century-inspired design. Furthermore, the shade's white interior serves as a natural deflector, allowing light from within to illuminate a room without diminishing its strength. 

Ideal for living rooms, dens, offices, bedrooms, and other living spaces, the unit's ceiling-mounted design works especially well in high-traffic areas with limited floor space, and it pairs handsomely with other fixtures from the distinguished Margot collection (sold separately), available in both oil rubbed bronze and brushed steel. Its 6 feet of matching chain and 10-foot cord length accommodate varying ceiling height applications. The pendant requires three 100-watt (M) bulbs (not included), and it includes optional white acrylic diffuser for softly muted light.

ABOUT KENROY HOME
For over 50 years, Kenroy Home has been synonymous with refined design, quality, and value. Kenroy Home design and lighting professionals seek regional and global inspiration, as a prelude to the creation of innovative and custom product ideas that enhance your environment. In 2008, Kenroy Home was purchased by its employees--a unique first in the lighting industry. 

Kenroy's lamps and portable lighting utilize a wide variety of materials, and create artistic elements that complement your home furnishings as well as make their own statements. Particular care is paid to hand applied polishing and painting, matched with the finest in glass and shade treatments. The company's chandeliers and ceiling lighting run the gamut of styles, from classical and traditional to contemporary and casual.

WHAT'S IN THE BOX
Lamp Details Bulb Three 100-watt medium bulbs Switch Switch via direct wiring Glass/Shade 22-inch diameter bronze gold metallic fabric shade MARGOT 3 LIGHT PENDANT
AT A GLANCE:
 * Crisp, clean design great for dining rooms, kitchen nooks, and even bedrooms
   
   
 * 6-foot matching chain
   
   
 * Includes optional white acrylic diffuser 
   
   
 * 21-inch height
   
   
 * Oil rubbed bronze finish
   
   
 * One-year limited warranty



FROM THE MANUFACTURER
Kenroy Home Margot 3 light pendant in oil rubbed bronze finish comes with a 22-Inch diameter bronze gold metallic fabric shade. The crisp, clean design of Margot is elegant no matter what the color: brushed steel or oil rubbed bronze makes for a gorgeous modern neutral. Either way, a simple drum shade keeps things streamlined.

See more
feature_bullets: The metallic fabric shade and brushed steel spherical accents make the Margot 3 light pendant a design staple in your home for years to come
With its neutral design, the Margot is perfect for French cottage kitchens, coastal living rooms, high vaulted ceiling foyers and stairways, farmhouse dining rooms and contemporary breakfast nooks
Casual drum pendant shape and color pairs with the modern styled brushed steel to create an interesting, contemporary twist on farmhouse or French cottage design
Fantastic down light with diffuser included, 3 bulbs; can be used with your home dimmer. easily change Bulb from the top or by removing the diffuser on the bottom

Hang from your vaulted ceilings in your entryway or living room – the Margot includes 6 Ft. of chain and 10 Ft. of wire for you to suspend the pendant from the perfect height. not enough chain? add an additional 3.5 Ft. if more is needed (not included)
LED bulbs compatible; if dimmable bulbs are needed, make sure bulbs you purchase are dimmable LED Bulb and you use a LED compatible dimmer
Each of our products comes with an industry leading 1-year limited warranty. our concierge customer care team is just a phone call or email away to quickly resolve any product questions

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.4 out of 5 stars101 ratings4.4 out of 5 stars
